mosinstall.name: Expose Thumbnail Scroller
mosinstall.author: Bruno Marchant
mosinstall.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/ GPL license
mosinstall.description:
Expose Scroller - 3.0 beta3

The Expose scroller module for Joomla 1.0.x and 1.5.x, moves a specified quantity of Expose gallery photos from one or all albums in horizontal or vertical direction over your website.

You can check out a demo of the scroller can be found on our site http://www.gotgtek.net/

HOW TO USE ?

There are two ways to point the scroller to its pictures:
  • You can defign a thumbnailpath (directory located from Joomlaroot), even search for pictures in subdirectories.
  • Or if you have Expose RC3+ component installed (but we advise to update to the latest version), install this module and set the parameters below like you want. Don't forget to publish it! This will disable the search in subalbums, but enable the possibility to link to the picture.
Without changing anything on the default settings, the scroller will loop horizontal from right to the left with 10 random photos from your Expose gallery.

FEATURES

  • Use the Expose photos by defining its album-id (leave empty or use 0 to pick from all), or type the path to an other picture directory located from joomlaroot
  • You can define your own seperate CSS styling included inside the module's code.
  • Have multiple instances of the module running on the same page!
  • One module can scroll in horizontal or vertical direction, or even stay fixed at position.
  • Pause the scrollig on mouse-over.
  • Link the photos to the Expose component collecion, album, picture or slideshow.
  • NEW Link pictures to popup window by ShadowBox (Expose and thumbnailpath pictures).
  • Random or newest image pick.
  • Random photo-pick checked to prevent a picture showing twice.
  • Photo descriptions are shown as tooltip (IE only).
  • NEW Uses (DOM)XML lib (module must be installed on webserver).

FOR INFO, UPDATES, REQUESTS & CONTACT

There are multiple locations to find something about Expose. The project is registered at JoomlaCode.org, where you can download the latest updates. The official website with latest news and demo of this Joomla extension, can be found at GTEK.
For problemsolving, first try to read the manual of Expose (at JoomlaCode), or search our forum. If you're really desperate or want to post comments, requests or even discuss the extension, open a new topic on these pages.

Please show your support by rating or commenting the Expose component at the official Joomla! Extensions website HERE. Thank you for your support!

This extension is released under the GNU/GPL license.

(Last update: may 4th, 2008 - version 3.0 beta3)

param.name: ModuleId_sfx
param.label: Module Id Suffix
param.description: A unique suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: ImagePath
param.label: AlbumId or ThumbnailPath
param.description: Set the albumid to show the thumbnails from; leave empty or use '0' to search in all albums, or type the relative folder path to a THUMBNAIL picture folder eg: images/stories

param.name: Subdirs
param.label: Include Subfolders
param.description: Should there be searched for pictures in subdirectories (only if thumbnailpath entered above) ?

param.name: type
param.label: Image Search Type
param.description: Define the filename criteria as extra filter. It's advisable to use thumbnail pics. Use 'sm\.(jpg|gif|png)$' for Expose pics

param.name: Linking
param.label: Images linked
param.description: How should the pictures be linked to the Expose component on click (when using a Thumbnailpath, only Shadowbox is available) ?

param.name: Pause
param.label: Pause OnMouseOver?
param.description: Should the slideshow pause on MouseOver?

param.name: Width
param.label: Scroll Width
param.description: Set the Width of the scroller area. On vertical scrolling, the pics are equally (X and Y) resized to the width setting. Use fixed size (eg 450px) or procentual (eg 100%) values.

param.name: Height
param.label: Scroll Height
param.description: Set the Height of the scroller area. On horizontal scrolling, the pics are equally (X and Y) resized to the height setting. Use fixed size (eg 450px) or procentual (eg 100%) values.

param.name: PicsNum
param.label: Number of pics
param.description: Number of pictures to display. Use 0 to show ALL the pictures found in the album, but pageload can drasticly increase!

param.name: PickMethod
param.label: Display Method
param.description: Sorting of the images on the strip

param.name: Speed
param.label: Scroll Speed
param.description: Adjust the scrolling speed (1 = fast, 500 = slow).

param.name: Space
param.label: Scroll Space
param.description: Amount of space between each image. Default is 3px.

param.name: UseCss
param.label: Use CSS entered below?
param.description: Do you want the module to use the CSS entered below?

param.name: Css
param.label: CSS
param.description: Edit CSS to be included in the script here. Note: don't use return, simply type everything on the same line.
